name: @randy.tarampi/serverless
description: Some opinionated serverless utilities for my own use

scripts.build:babel: yarn run build:babel:esm && yarn run build:babel:es5
scripts.build:babel:es5: cross-env-shell BABEL_ENV=client.es5 babel src --out-dir es5 --root-mode upward --copy-files
scripts.build:babel:esm: cross-env-shell BABEL_ENV=client.esm babel src --out-dir esm --root-mode upward --copy-files
scripts.prepack: if [ -z "$RELEASE" ] && [ -z "$CI" ]; then cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=prd yarn run build; fi; if [ ! -d "./dist" ] && [ ! -d "./es5" ] && [ ! -d "./esm" ]; then exit 74; fi;
scripts.prepare: npm run snyk-protect && if [ -z "$IS_PUBLISHING" ]; then yarn run build; fi;
